page.title: 12Unilever In Sharnbrook
page.content: Unilever came to Sharnbrook in 1947. {They wanted to start research into {farm crops and animals.}Lots of space was needed where animals could graze and crops could grow. The Colworth Estate was for sale - with easy access to London and the North. {Unilever has {benifitted Sharnbrook in many ways.} They have provided interesting work for many people living in Sharnbrook. Many young people from Sharnbrook have started with Unilever and benefitted from the{day release scheme.} Unilever has attracted people who have helped in a variety of ways. Some people that Unilever has brought into the area are married to people who have taken jobs locally. {Unilever employs {about 1200 people.} There are 27 sports and social clubs. Unilever provides a canteen and subsidises transport.
